question.title: What is the indication for performing an immuno-allergic test?
question.description: Use of specific IgE and provocation tests

option_a.title: When asthma is diagnosed
option_a.description: A common indication for performing an immuno-allergic test

option_b.title: When rhinitis is suspected to be of allergic origin
